Hello!

We're sending you the Banners of Dynastic Reckoning item, as we believe an in-game issue may have prevented you from receiving it. The item was intended to be awarded for your completion of the story epilogue Small Victory," and is part of a collection called Raise the Banners: Amnoon Arbitrator.

column1: Please enjoy the item, and good luck!"

column2: When's the best time to make an appointment? Tooth-hurty!

The sea beckons to us all, yet only a handful of enterprising privateers have managed to turn it into a successful career. What separates these seafaring scalawags from an everyday landlubber like you?

With this book in your hands? NOTHING!

Even if you can't tie a knot to save your life, even if you think port" is just a fancy wine, and even if the mere thought of standing on a boat makes you queasy, this step-by-step guide will give you the tools to transform yourself into a hardened corsair.

column1: Learn the following vital skills to grow your sea legs:
The basics of swordplay, complete with gorgeously rendered illustrations.
Surviving on a desert island in the event of marooning.
Three valuable tricks to identifying suspect grog.
How to spot mutinous crew members.

She was an elite soldier in the Mordant Crescent, brought back from the dead to serve the great Palawa Joko, but the only thing that was Awakened in her was her heart.

He was a simple mummy, adorned in rotting bandages that held him together, but in truth, he was coming to pieces inside.

Together, they found a relationship that defied death itself, and began an adventure that would shake the foundations of the Bone Palace itself as they sought to answer a simple question: Can love endure after a heart stops beating?
Path of Fire" may be purchased at http://www.guildwars2.com."
